name: Extract from File
natural_language_description: 这是 Extract from File 节点。主要用于: Convert binary data to JSON

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: csv
available_options: Extract From CSV (值: csv) - Transform a CSV file into output items
Extract From HTML (值: html) - Transform a table in an HTML file into output items
Extract From ICS (值: fromIcs) - Transform a ICS file into output items
Extract From JSON (值: fromJson) - Transform a JSON file into output items
Extract From ODS (值: ods) - Transform an ODS file into output items
Extract From PDF (值: pdf) - Extracts the content and metadata from a PDF file
Extract From RTF (值: rtf) - Transform a table in an RTF file into output items
Extract From Text File (值: text) - Extracts the content of a text file
Extract From XML (值: xml) - Extracts the content of an XML file
Extract From XLS (值: xls) - Transform an Excel file into output items
Extract From XLSX (值: xlsx) - Transform an Excel file into output items
Move File to Base64 String (值: binaryToPropery) - Convert a file into a base64-encoded string

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be extracted | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: joinPages (值: None) - Whether to join the text from all pages or return an array of text from each page
maxPages (值: None) - Maximum number of pages to include
password (值: None) - Prowide password, if the PDF is encrypted

destinationKey.name: destinationKey
destinationKey.description: The name of the output field that will contain the extracted data
destinationKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination Output Field | 作用: The name of the output field that will contain the extracted data | 默认值: data | (必填项)
